summary: I START THE CAR AND THE AIR BAG SENSOR COMES ON AND STAYS ON, THEN THE PASSENGERS SEAT BELT COMES ON WHIEN I HAVE A PASSENGER SEATED THERE. I FEEL THIS IS A SAFTEY ISSUE AND HYUNDAII SHOULD FIX IT!!!!   I CONTACTED  HYUNDAI CUSTOMER  SUPPORT, THEY STATED ITS MY PROBLEM AND THEY WOULD NOT HELP.
